FuncDef:
The crl http command configures the automatic update of the CRL through HTTP.
The crl ldap command configures the automatic update of the CRL through LDAP.
The undo crl http command cancels the automatic update of the CRL through HTTP.
The undo crl ldap command cancels the automatic update of the CRL through LDAP.
By default, the CRL is updated automatically through HTTP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To use HTTP/LDAP for updating the CRL automatically, run the crl http/ldap command first.
Note the following when the device automatically updates the CRL through HTTP/LDAP:
The CRL file cannot exceed 1 MB.There is sufficient space in the CF card for the CRL file.
